channel.title: Dupe on Hybrid PvP? WILL REP
channel.description: There is a dupe on my server, hybrid pvp v3 source, where one person trades money, accepts, then in the 2nd trade screen one person accepts, and the person who traded the money, accepts and clicks the mini map as fast as possible, and the money doubles and they both have it. Any way to fix it? Its annoying and ruining the economy.

item.title: Dupe on Hybrid PvP? WILL REP
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

It didnt work, it still allows players to walk.

Read full topic
item.source: Dupe on Hybrid PvP? WILL REP
